title: Happy of the End
original_name: ハッピー・オブ・ジ・エンド
sinopse:
Chihiro woke up in a tattered state on a garbage dump. Suddenly, a man approached him while looking down on him with a smile. He then remembered that this man had abandoned him at this place just half a day ago...?

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)
